power.name: Power
power.usage: `power<x> <parameter>` where _<x>_ is relay number and _parameter_ is one of:

params.name: _None_
params.function: Show current power state of relay<x> as On or Off, also resetting its PulseTime

params.name: _None_
params.function: Show current MQTT power retain state

params.name: 0 / off
params.function: (default) Disable MQTT power retain on status update

params.name: 1 / on
params.function: Enable MQTT power retain on status update
